dialogues.DialogueText: Oh look! We're on a Pirate Ship! Can I be the captain?
Pirates!? I wanna fight pirates! Lemme at ‘em!
That could be interesting. I read about how pirates have caused troubles in the past. Perhaps we could fight them off and save the sea!
How do we defeat them most effectively though?
We attack them! We surround them!
Excellent idea! If three of us surround one of them, they will be much weaker. Looks like there are some canons and generators to help us fight them too.
I see the captain of the ship! His beard is on fire! He looks like a meanie!
I still want to be captain of the ship.
Stand next to the wheel and you could pretend you are... I guess.
Yay! Then I can sail it to outer space!
Is everybody ready? Let's get to the bow of the ship!
I’ll race you to the front of the ship!
...and make a lot of alien friends...
Heh, this is silly. But I guess it could be fun. Let’s GO!
